sentences.en: ...the frosted glass panel set in the centre of the door.
sentences.cn: …嵌在门中心的毛玻璃板。

sentences.en: A panel of experts has looked at the proposal.
sentences.cn: 一组专家审核了那项提议。

sentences.en: A panel of judges is now selecting the finalists.
sentences.cn: 评判小组现在正选拔参加决赛的选手。

sentences.en: an instrument panel
sentences.cn: 仪表盘

sentences.en: Frances decided to conceal the machine behind a hinged panel.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯决定把机器藏在带铰链的嵌板的后面。

sentences.en: Go to Control Panel and double-click on Sounds for a list of sounds.
sentences.cn: 进入“控制面板”双击“语音”图标就能看到所有的声音选项。

sentences.en: He assembled a panel of scholars to advise him.
sentences.cn: 他集结了一个学者小组为他出谋划策。

sentences.en: He was not listed under his real name on the residents panel.
sentences.cn: 他未以真名在居民名册上登记。

sentences.en: He works as a panel beater in a local garage.
sentences.cn: 他在当地一家修车厂做板金维修工.

sentences.en: Lay strips of 4mm ply over the mesh and nail these down with panel pins.
sentences.cn: 把4毫米厚的胶合板条铺在网子上，然后用镶板钉钉牢。

sentences.en: The advice is based on the distilled wisdom of a panel of heart specialists.
sentences.cn: 该建议是在汇集提取了心脏专家小组的意见后作出的。

sentences.en: The equipment was extremely sophisticated and was monitored from a central control panel.
sentences.cn: 这台设备极其复杂，是由中央控制面板监控的。

sentences.en: The jury panel was drawn.
sentences.cn: 陪审员名单通过抽签决定了.

sentences.en: The panel had a veneer of gold and ivory.
sentences.cn: 这木板上面镶饰了一层金和象牙.

sentences.en: The panel of judges included several well - known writers.
sentences.cn: 评判小组中包括几位 知名 作家.

sentences.en: The panel says the ground rules for the current talks should be maintained.
sentences.cn: 专家组称目前会谈的基本原则应该保持不变。

sentences.en: The panel shows marked similarities with mosaics found elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 这块嵌板和在其他地方找到的镶嵌图案有明显的相似之处.

sentences.en: The unusual control panel on the walls caught our attention.
sentences.cn: 墙上不同寻常的控制板引起了我们的注意.

sentences.en: There will be at least three senior doctors on the panel.
sentences.cn: 专家小组中至少有三名资深医生。

sentences.en: This panel has a crack on it.
sentences.cn: 这块镶板有裂痕了.

sentences.en: Vibrations shook the panel loose.
sentences.cn: 仪表板震松了.

words.tran_cn: 专门小组成员；专题讨论小组参加者（等于panellist）
用木或玻璃板等镶嵌或装饰（panel的现在分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: ◎[英国英语]已登记为替参加国民健康保险者治病的医生
小样本连续研究法；盘区开采法；[化]板块法

trans.tran_cn: 专门小组，（门等的）镶板，嵌板，仪表板，面板
trans.tran_en: a board in a car, plane, boat etc that has the controls on it

trans.tran_cn: 镶板，控制板；座谈小组；镶饰
trans.tran_en: a board in a car, plane, boat etc that has the controls on it

trans.tran_cn: 镶板（用木或玻璃板等镶嵌或装饰）
